response: twitter's data policy protects your personal information. the website does not share or sell your data to third parties for marketing purposes, but it collects and processes some of your personal information for internal use, such as analytics and ads personalization. it also uses cookies and similar technologies to collect data from your device, including your ip address, browser type, operating system, referring urls, and browsing history. you can choose not to receive personalized ads by adjusting the settings in your twitter account.
